text: Fearless is a 2016 Portuguese-language original Netflix documentary series created by Andrew Fried and starring Grant Crookes and Ty Hurley following a group of U.S. and Brazilian professional bull riders. ==Premise== Fearless follows a group of U.S. and Brazilian professional bull riders. The series takes a look at the community, the background and the current culture of bull- riding, with the former bull-riding champion Adriano Moraes adding his thoughts periodically. ==Cast== * Grant Crookes * Ty Murray ==Release== It was released on August 19, 2016 on Netflix streaming. ==References== ==External links== * * * Category:Portuguese-language Netflix original programming
title: Fearless (2016 TV series)
